commitResults.messageTitle: Changed Duke.java. Added Greet, Echo and Exit functionality. Updated gitignore include class files in src/main/java
Changed built-in phrases to give Duke a formal personality. Edited the chatbox to have an indentation and max 60 character limit.
Added Add and List functionality
Added a Task class and added Marking as done functionality
Refactored code to use Regex and if statements instead of switch case and if statements. Changed some variables names. Fixed some syntax.
Added 3 subclasses of Tasks
Added test cases. Fixed the regex to search only from start of line.
Added some error handling. Automated Text UI broke in the process
Automated UI Testing fixed
Added Delete function
Update Duke.java to have a log between uses
Update Deadline and Event to use LocalDate
Updated Deadline.java merging errors
Refactor entire code in OOP and gradle
Add package for all java files
Create Task Package
Edit parser. Mild changes to remove warnings
Revert "Updated Deadline.java merging errors"
Move date parser from Task to Parser Add ability to export to jar w/ Gradle
Add tests for deadline
Add Find command
Add Javadoc
Update code to follow Coding Standard
Update Parser.java to fix find invalid format bug
Edit task subclasses to have protected fields
Reduced calls of System.out outside of Ui to prepare for GUI
Refactor code for GUI
Implement FXML
Fix UI warnings
Refactor duke package
commitResults.messageBody:
Most of the code had poor SLAP practice. Could make it hard to read

Having only 1 layer of abstraction makes understanding functions
easier.

Let's extract complicated functions into separate parts.

commitResults.messageTitle: TaskList class: Fix reading from log file bug
commitResults.messageBody:
The TaskList writes to the log file in a simple, easy to read way.
But it reads it as if it was a normal input

The intended functionality is not working

Let's change to code to work temporarily.

commitResults.messageTitle: Storage class : Extract updateLogFile to TaskList
commitResults.messageBody:
Storage class uses Task package only for updateLogFile. Task List
uses it for a lot of functions.

Extracting updateLogFile has the benefit of making Storage simpler
while not affecting TaskList much.

Let's extract updateLogFile to TaskList

commitResults.messageTitle: Storage Class: rename getIoException to getIOException
commitResults.messageBody:
Originally Io to follow camel case, changed to IO to match original
class name

commitResults.messageTitle: duke package: Add javadocs Javadocs is not done for all methods in duke package
Delete unused methods
Task Class : Fix error in javadoc
TaskList Class: Change loadFromStorage() to use stream Currently uses a for loop
commitResults.messageBody:
Slow and can be improved.

Let's change it to streams

commitResults.messageTitle: Add assertions Some segments of code rely on others
commitResults.messageBody:
Another person taking over might not know

Let's use asserts to inform future people taking over the code

commitResults.messageTitle: Added New Text Document.txt I don't have enough practice writing commits (Current State)
commitResults.messageBody:
Writing commits in the recommended format will make further readers
understand the What, Why and How. (Benefit)

Let's create a dummy commit (Action)

commitResults.messageTitle: Populated New Text Document.txt Dummy commit
Populated New Text Document.txt with b
TaskList class : Add regex to find for advanced users Find currently uses string's contain to check for tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
It can be improved to search for similar strings - such as brick or
brock

Let's implement regex into the find keyword

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove New Text Document.txt We still have this file
commitResults.messageBody:
It was for practicing PR and commits. Serves no purpose now

Let's delete it

commitResults.messageTitle: Update GUI to look better when resized Elements do not auto resize when window size is changed
commitResults.messageBody:
Is unintuitive and ugly

Let's change the fxml files

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug where Date was not in output date format
Fix bug with Deadline and Event classes Regex pattern was not being used correctly.
commitResults.messageBody:
Unable to create Events or create Deadlines that didn't end with /by

Let's edit the code to fix that

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove select comments
Add Ui.png
Move README.md to docs folder
Update README Website is not informative
commitResults.messageBody:
Could provide users with information to make learning the app faster

Let's add a user manual.
